00019 // can't use this - much as I'd like to as borland doesn't support it
00020 // #include <boost/scoped_ptr.hpp>
00021 
00022 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/type_traits/broken_compiler_spec.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/serialization/tracking_enum.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/archive/basic_archive.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/archive/detail/decl.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00028 
00029 namespace boost {
00030 namespace serialization {
00031     class extended_type_info;
00032 } // namespace serialization
00033 
00034 namespace archive {
00035 namespace detail {
00036 
00037 class basic_iarchive_impl;
00038 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_iserializer;
00039 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_pointer_iserializer;
00041 // class basic_iarchive - read serialized objects from a input stream
00042 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_iarchive 
00043 {
00044     friend class basic_iarchive_impl;
00045     // hide implementation of this class to minimize header conclusion
00046     // in client code. I couldn't used scoped pointer with borland
00047     // boost::scoped_ptr<basic_iarchive_impl> pimpl;
00048     basic_iarchive_impl * pimpl;
00049 
00050     virtual void vload(version_type &t) =  0;
00051     virtual void vload(object_id_type &t) =  0;
00052     virtual void vload(class_id_type &t) =  0;
00053     virtual void vload(class_id_optional_type &t) = 0;
00054     virtual void vload(class_name_type &t) = 0;
00055     virtual void vload(tracking_type &t) = 0;
00056 protected:
00057     basic_iarchive(unsigned int flags);
00058     // account for bogus gcc warning
00059     #if defined(__GNUC__)
00060     virtual
00061     #endif
00062     ~basic_iarchive();
00063 public:
00064     // note: NOT part of the public API.
00065     void next_object_pointer(void *t);
00066     void register_basic_serializer(
00067         const /* BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) */ basic_iserializer & bis
00068     );
00069     void load_object(
00070         void *t, 
00071         const /* BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) */ basic_iserializer & bis
00072     );
00073     const /* BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) */ basic_pointer_iserializer * 
00074     load_pointer(
00075         void * & t, 
00076         const /* BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) */
00077             basic_pointer_iserializer * bpis_ptr,
00078         const /* BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) */
00079         basic_pointer_iserializer * (*finder)(
00080             const boost::serialization::extended_type_info & eti
00081         )
00082     );
00083     // real public API starts here
00084     void 
00085     set_library_version(unsigned int archive_library_version);
00086     unsigned int 
00087     get_library_version() const;
00088     unsigned int
00089     get_flags() const;
00090     void 
00091     reset_object_address(const void * new_address, const void * old_address);
00092     void 
00093     delete_created_pointers();
00094 };
00095 
00096 } // namespace detail
00097 } // namespace archive
00098 } // namespace boost
00099 
00100 // required by smart_cast for compilers not implementing 
00101 // partial template specialization
00102 BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(
00103     boost::archive::detail::basic_iarchive  
00104 )
